title: Historical Trends and Applications in 21st-Century Educational Technology and Research

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of educational technology and mathematics pedagogy
context.additional_context: A course analyzing key events and technologies in 21st-century educational technology advancements and their impact on mathematics education for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can describe the major developmental stages and events in the field of educational technology since the 21st century.
Learners can analyze the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on the advancement of educational technology.
Learners can explain the historical development of digital tools applicable to mathematics education.

resources: Analysis of Key Educational Technology Case Studies
Comparative Resource for Digital Tools in Mathematics Education

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
